DOC.brief_summary: The primary purpose of this study is to evaluate the antiviral activity of oral BTA-C585 compared to placebo in healthy volunteers after intranasal challenge with RSV-A Memphis 37b virus.
DOC.brief_title: Safety, Efficacy and Pharmacokinetics of BTA-C585 in a RSV Viral Challenge Study
DOC.criteria: 1. Healthy male or female 2. Between 18 to 50 years old 3. Body mass index of 18 to 30 kg/m2 1. Acute or chronic medical illness 2. Abnormal lung function Positive for HIV, Hepatitis B or C 3. Any significant abnormality of the nose or nasopharynx
